content: round 2 corner series x4 12 round 3 scbps around 12 tie off and squish into a rectangular shape using black yarn and a sewing needle sew a triangle nose on note in the pictures in this pattern i will be using brown instead of black because it is easier to see individual stitches in brown head use 5 mm hook round 1 using doubled up white yarn chain 3 drop one of the two strands then chain 2 and tighten the last chain by pulling on the backside of the loop still on your hook this should leave you with 3 thick loops for crocheting into plus one loop that brings you up to the next round round 2 in the middle stitch of the three thick chains single_crochet 1 continuing from next stitch 180 series first 4 stitches in black last 1 in white single_crochet 1 in white 180 series first 4 in black last 1 in white 12 round 3 1 single_crochet white corner series 1 white 2 black with no invisible color change between instead finish off the 1 white stitch by pulling through with white yarn before switching to black 1 single_crochet black corner series in white 3 single_crochet in white 1 corner series 2 white 1 black with no invisible color change 1 single_crochet black corner series 1 black 2 white 2 single_crochet white 20 round 4 2 scbp white 2 scbp black 9 scbps w 2 scbps black 4 scbps white 20 round 5 2 single_crochet white 2 single_crochet black 10 single_crochet white 1 single_crochet black 5 single_crochet white 20 round 6 single_crochet around in white 20 round 7 single_crochet around in white instead of joining the end of the round with the first stitch using a slip stitch then a chain up do one extra slip_stitch before the chain up to shift your starting point of the next round forward by one stitch 20 round 8 1 scbp st3bptg 3 scbps st3bptg 1 scbp st3bptg 3 scbps st3bptg 12 stuff round 9 inv decrease 2 single_crochet 2 inv decrease 2 single_crochet inv decrease 8 sew hole closed and tie off head continued sew nose on bottom center of face see picture on previous page to determine which side of the head is up to make the ears tie black yarn around the corner stitch in the right top corner of the face two row back from the face front slip_stitch around this same stitch then chain 1 then all in this same stitch do a corner series in the next stitch do both a single_crochet and a slip_stitch then tie off to make the left ear face the back of the head and repeat above optionally with black yarn sew around the outline of the black eye patches to create a more distinct outline sew on white eyes body use 5 mm hook round 1 in white chain 4 with doubled up yarn then with single yarn chain 2 then tighten the
